title: Interpretation of a dream about cockroaches on clothes

When a married woman sees cockroaches walking on the body in a dream, she may resort to envy, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees cockroaches, he may become envious, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a cockroach bite in a dream. If a married woman sees a cockroach biting in a dream, this may represent a change in some characteristics. And God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream killing cockroaches, this may indicate victory, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream, complete interpretations

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream has wide interpretations. The husband has a great influence on the wife’s life, whether in her life matters, her responsibilities towards him, or her psychological state. To see a husband in a dream is natural and very likely because the wife goes through many situations with the husband and stores them all in her mind, whether It was positive or negative, and in the hours of sleep the mind recalls all information and situations, and some of them may appear in the form of a dream. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing a husband in a dream with complete interpretations.Interpretation of a dream about seeing a husband in a dream. Ibn Sirin explained that a wife seeing her husband in a dream appears The strong relationship of love, tenderness and compassion that unites the spouses. The wife seeing her husband in good condition means abundant sustenance and blessing in the money they enjoy in their lives. Whoever sees in her dream that her husband is meeting with her, her vision stems from feelings of nostalgia for the first days of their marriage and her desire to Reviving good memories between them, and the vision reflects her feelings as well. Kindness and friendliness between spouses. When a wife dreams that she is living with her husband, her vision is a sign of family ties and the strength of the relationship that brings them together. Whoever sees her husband laughing in a dream, then sees that her skin is good, he will soon hear good news. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a husband in a dream for a woman A single woman finds herself involved with a strange man she does not know. She pretends to be her husband and treats her as if she were his wife, as if she was actually going through this period of emotional deprivation. When an unmarried woman sees in a dream her husband with a handsome appearance and an elegant appearance, she respects him a lot, on the basis that God Almighty God grants her good wealth in this world, and He will give her a good husband who will make it hers. A happy heart. While an unmarried woman sees her husband in a dirty and inappropriate form, unwanted visions warn her of sad things that will happen in the coming period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sick husband in a dream: A wife who sees her husband in a dream in a sick form or that he is dying indicates the deterioration of their conditions. Living conditions in reality, which makes the wife think a lot about the requirements of life and suffer from a lack of livelihood and money. This vision may also indicate the existence of differences between the spouses in reality. Whoever sees her husband dying in a dream, perhaps seeing it means that he will travel for work for a temporary period and then return. To her again. Whoever sees herself searching for her husband in a dream, then her vision is an indication that she feels emotionally empty because of her husband’s preoccupation with his family and household chores. Whoever sees her husband in a dream and he died in reality, asks her to offer him food or drink; Because seeing it is evidence of his need to pray and give charity to his soul. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a husband with another woman in a dream When a wife sees her husband with another woman, this indicates feelings of jealousy and her intense love for the husband and does not indicate at all the husband’s betrayal of his wife, as many believe. The marriage of the second wife in a dream It indicates the stability of the family and the happiness that the wife feels with her husband, and it is also a vision

title: Interpretation of walking in a dream: Seeing walking on the street in a dream

preview.html: The dream of walking indicates collecting money and victory over enemies and other interpretations, and we interpret it for the single woman, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the divorced woman, and the man, as if he is walking behind someone I know, walking with an unknown person, walking with someone I love, walking quickly on a long road, walking on the road, In the dark or in a dead end, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq and others, in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of walking in a dream Walking in a dream indicates seeking sustenance, and running is a victory over the enemy. Whoever sees himself walking, this indicates good beauty. Whoever sees himself at night with his head bowed in a dream, his life will be long, and it can For this to happen after an illness from which he suffered and from which he survived. Whoever sees that he is walking, or that an animal is walking with him, step by step, then it is glory and dignity. If a person dreams that he is walking on dirt, then he will get urgent money. If he walks on sand, then he is busy, and if he walks on Thorns and pain afflict some of his family. Whoever sees that he is walking in the path of a diligent, purposeful person, then he is on the path of truth, religion, and the law of Islam. Perhaps it indicates the righteousness of himself in religion or in this world. Whoever sees that he has deviated from the path or deviated from it, then he is moving away from the truth and the straight path in his religion. Or in his world. As long as he strays from the path, and if he goes out to the path after going astray, he will strike his path. If the path is not crossed, it will make the matter difficult. Whoever sees that he is confused in his path, then he is confused in his quest and in his righteousness. Whoever sees that he is taking a different path It does not lead him to it, then he is in a heresy in his religion, or he is seeking justification from his subject, and if the path is opened for him with guidance and will. He succeeds in his request. Interpretation of a dream about walking: If you walk in a shallow stream of water, this means great sadness over the hardships of work and living, and misunderstandings will lead to cold relations. If you walk in a pleasant place, luck will be on your side and you will possess prestige and wealth. If you walk at night, this means Adventures and the search for contentment and peace. If a woman sees in her dream that she is walking quickly, this means that she will inherit some property and have a distinctive personality. Interpretation of a dream about walking for a married woman. Walking in a dream for a married woman is evidence of her stability and a correct view of her family, especially her husband. Walking for a married woman is evidence of love and tenderness. It is evidence of family cohesion and a relationship based on understanding and respect. A married woman walking or walking in a dream indicates her close, healthy relationship with her husband, that her femininity is still domineering, and that she is in good health. Interpretation of a dream about walking for a pregnant woman Walking in a dream for a pregnant woman is a sign of the approaching date of birth. It heralds a healthy and normal condition. As for the gender of the baby, it is determined by the path that the pregnant woman takes or walks. If it is straight and easy, it indicates a girl. As for the rough, unpaved road, it looks like a boy. Walking or walking in a public park, market, or public place is a sign of the woman’s happiness and her expectation of good news. Interpretation of a dream about a girl walking on Single GirlWalking in a dream for an unmarried girl or girl is a sign of the fulfillment of unmarried ambitions

title: Interpretation of a dream about grilled fish in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing fried fish in a dream means traveling, living, and other interpretations that we will explain to single girls, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, single young men, and married men, such as eating fried fish, eating cooked fish, buying it, cooking it, and grilling it according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and others. Interpretation of grilled fish in a dream. Ibn Sirin says in his famous book ( Interpretation of great dreams): Grilled salted fish in a dream indicates a trip whose goal is to know the president or accompany him, as God Almighty said in Surat Al-Kahf: (When they reached a meeting point between them, they forgot their fish, so it headed to the sea in the shallow waters) The intention here is that the Prophet Moses is upon him. Peace be upon him and his companions before meeting our Master Destiny. Whoever eats a tender grilled fish will be ruined and will be better for the story of the table of Jesus Christ, peace be upon him. Eating grilled fish in a dream means meeting a need or responding to an invitation. Grilled fish in a man’s dream provides an abundant lifestyle if the man vomits. Otherwise, grilled fish in a dream indicates a punishment that may be inflicted on the dreamer. If a woman sees that she is soaking a small fish in flour, she will earn a little money and spend it to great benefit. It was said in the interpretation: Fish will be praised if it is grilled except for its texture; Because it has more thorns than meat. As for the thorns of a fish in a dream, it indicates enmity or competition between the dreamer and his family, and it is said that it is a hope or desire that the dreamer does not obtain except after hardship. Eating salted fish in a dream indicates a benefit or benefit that will benefit the dreamer at some point in time. Close to the time of the vision. Interpretation of eating grilled fish in a dream: Grilled fish, eating it in a dream, represents competition and enmity, and for women there is envy and magic. It is said to be a warning of a defect in the aunt’s life, and it is said to be a problem for the man. And hatred, and it was said that it indicates the pursuit of forbidden money, and it was said that it is an inheritance or an inheritance left behind by an enemy. Grilled fish is a spoil and good for the table of the story of Jesus, peace be upon him. If the man is pious, otherwise he will be tormented, and the roasted salt travels in search of knowledge or wisdom, according to the saying God Almighty: “They forgot their fish.” It was said: Fish are worthy of praise, especially grilled, except small fish; Because it has more thorns than its flesh, and it is a feud between it and its home, and it overlooks what does not reach it. Fried fish indicates that prayers are answered when seen or eaten, and grilled fish is interpreted as a journey in search of knowledge, goodness, or religion, and eating it increases the demand for it. He sees the sky raining grilled or fried fish, then it is interpreted as an answer to his supplication or victory over someone who is conspiring against him or against one of his enemies. It is said that it indicates status and high status among men, but whoever looks at the sky for a long time while fish is falling from it, this indicates illness. Or sadness. Eating salted fish indicates goodness and benefit at that time. A dream about eating fish whose flesh is soft, whether grilled or fried, indicates the acquisition of spoils, livelihood, profit, and an increase in money. Eating fresh fish in a dream is an omen It is good for those who eat it, because it brings grace

title: Interpretation of a dead person in a dream: Seeing a dead person’s illness in a dream

preview.html: A dream about a sick dead person shows that he is asking you for begging or charity and other interpretations that we will interpret for single, married, pregnant, divorced, unmarried and unmarried women. A young married man like seeing the deceased tired or in the hospital or complaining of head or back pain or seeing the deceased dying or suffering from neck or abdominal pain. Or a man or person who died of cancer according to Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi and others. There are many interpretations and clues about the interpretation of seeing a dead patient in a dream, which a person must know in order to obtain the correct interpretation, and we will reveal some of them as interpreted by Ibn Sirin, the translator. Al-Kabir. Interpretation of the dead in a dream. The illness of a dead person in a dream often indicates that there is a responsibility that he violated in his life, or that there is a weakness in his religion that calls for supplication for him and zakat on him. Pain in any of the deceased’s organs can indicate something: for example, seeing The deceased complains about his head in a dream, because he is responsible for his negligence in the affairs of his mother or his boss. Seeing the deceased complaining about his neck indicates his responsibility for losing money or his wife’s dowry. Seeing his complaint on his hand indicates his responsibility for his brother or partner or taking a false oath. Complaining about The side is responsible for the rights of the wife. If the deceased complains about his stomach, this indicates his responsibility for the rights of the child and his relatives. Seeing the dead person complaining about his feet indicates his responsibility to spend his money on matters other than pleasing God Almighty. If his thigh complains, then he is responsible for severing the relationship. And sweat. And if he complains about his legs, then he is responsible for wasting his life in a lie. The imam mentioned in the interpretation of this vision that it indicates a reprehensible act committed by the deceased during his life, and this act made him face what the deceased had not hoped for after his departure from life. And whoever sees in a dream that a dead person came while he was sick In a dream or a dream and his illness, aches and pains were in his head, the vision shows that the dead person was not fair to his parents. However, if the dead person was suffering from pain and pain in the position of the neck or neck, then the vision indicates that the dead person did not manage his money well and that he wasted it in the joy of life. Or he did not pay zakat. And alms. Whoever sees in a dream a dead person in pain and complaining of pain in his arm, the vision indicates that the dead person was the one who took care of his brothers’ affairs and did not fulfill their rights. Or that the dead person stole something during his lifetime, or that the dead person squandered and plundered his brother or sister’s money. Whether the money is from the estate or for any other reason. But if the dead person suffers from pain in one side or the waist, the vision indicates that the dead person wronged a woman in his life and did not fulfill her rights. Whoever sees a sick dead person in a dream and complains of pain and pain in his stomach The vision indicates that the deceased did not fulfill the rights of his father or anyone he knew, whether relatives or friends. Or the vision is interpreted as the deceased spending on pleasures and entertainment from money that is not his right. But if the deceased is in pain and complains about his feet, the vision shows that The dead person was wasting his time committing transgressions and misdeeds. Whoever sees in a dream that Mi

If his thigh complains, then he is responsible for severing the relationship. And sweat. And if he complains about his legs, then he is responsible for wasting his life in a lie. The imam mentioned in the interpretation of this vision that it indicates a reprehensible act committed by the deceased during his life, and this act made him face what the deceased had not hoped for after his departure from life. And whoever sees in a dream that a dead person came while he was sick In a dream or a dream and his illness, aches and pains were in his head, the vision shows that the dead person was not fair to his parents. However, if the dead person was suffering from pain and pain in the position of the neck or neck, then the vision indicates that the dead person did not manage his money well and that he wasted it in the joy of life. Or he did not pay zakat. And alms. Whoever sees in a dream a dead person in pain and complaining of pain in his arm, the vision indicates that the dead person was the one who took care of his brothers’ affairs and did not fulfill their rights. Or that the dead person stole something during his lifetime, or that the dead person squandered and plundered his brother or sister’s money. Whether the money is from the estate or for any other reason. But if the dead person suffers from pain in one side or the waist, the vision indicates that the dead person wronged a woman in his life and did not fulfill her rights. Whoever sees a sick dead person in a dream and complains of pain and pain in his stomach The vision indicates that the deceased did not fulfill the rights of his father or anyone he knew, whether relatives or friends. Or the vision is interpreted as the deceased spending on pleasures and entertainment from money that is not his right. But if the deceased is in pain and complains about his feet, the vision shows that The dead person was wasting his time committing transgressions and misdeeds. Whoever sees in a dream that Mi

title: Interpretation of seeing white teeth in a dream

preview.html: Many people have unclear visions in their dreams, so scientists interpreted the signs in the dream to prevent misunderstanding and clarify the meaning of the vision, so in today’s article we talk about white teeth in a dream, through the encyclopedia website, through the lines below. White teeth in a dream. Dream interpretation and vision scholars mentioned that Dreams carry signs for the dreamer that are reflected in his life on the ground, and this is the case in the case of a correct vision, otherwise it is a dream of imagination. Dream interpreters explain that seeing teeth in a dream varies from one person to another, depending on the state of the dreamer’s vision and the shape of the teeth. The interpretation of a dream about seeing white teeth in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from a problem and it is causing him psychological pain. Seeing white teeth in a dream means that the dreamer He is going through hardships and heartaches, but the vision brings good news for comfort. Seeing teeth in a dream expresses that the dreamer is living in a state of severe psychological pressure, but the dream came to calm him down and tell him that the next will be better and life will return to normal again, God willing. Interpretation of white teeth in Dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin is considered one of the great Arab interpreters who provided many interpretations of the meanings of dreams. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that the whiteness of teeth in a dream is a sign that the pregnant woman is an honest and self-confident woman. Seeing white teeth in a dream means that the dreamer has humane medical qualities that make him He is loved by everyone around him. Seeing white teeth falling out one by one means that the dreamer will pay off all the debts he bears, and the dream in it is a message of peace and reassurance. Seeing white teeth in a dream that are healthy and clean, explains that the dreamer will experience a period of stress and problems, but all of this will end. And life will be filled with calm and peace. Interpretation of a dream about white teeth for a man: We explain to you in detail the interpretation of a dream about white teeth for a man in the following lines. Seeing white teeth in a man’s dream means that he will marry a girl whom he loves and who loves him, and their married life will be filled with happiness and love. Dreaming of white teeth in a man’s dream when he is at rest indicates Until comfort and abundance of sustenance are coming, it may be a sign of his success in work or study. Seeing white teeth that are large in size and long in length, means that the man is going through difficulties in his life, but the dream is a sign of sweet relief and happiness, as it shows that the dreamer is entering the field of work with duty. Seeing teeth in a dream clean and clean explains that this dream is praiseworthy and it carries good news for the dreamer, as it shows that goodness is approaching in the dreamer’s life. White teeth in a pregnant woman’s dream. The pregnant woman is going through a period of stress and tension as a result of hormonal changes in her body due to pregnancy, and this It greatly affects her dreams, and many have wondered about the meaning of having teeth in a dream. Interpreters explain that a dream in which teeth are white and bright is a promising dream for its owner. Seeing teeth in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she will give birth to a good child with his family, morals, and religion, to

title: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased husband giving his wife money in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a deceased husband giving money to his wife in a dream In case you are looking for an interpretation of dreams about a deceased husband giving money to his wife in a dream, one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for it, so we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some Diligent scholars and site managers do not interfere in interpretations, but rather convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about a deceased husband giving his wife money in a dream. In the event that you see a deceased husband giving his wife money in a dream, this may indicate the tremendous sustenance and good things that will come to his wife at this time, and God knows best. If a woman sees that her deceased husband was donating money to her, this may indicate many changes occurring in her life during this time, thanks to God. Dreaming of a husband dying while giving his wife money may indicate sins and transgressions that may befall them in the coming days. Thanks to God. In the case of a dream where the deceased husband gives his wife money, it can indicate happy events happening to the woman at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of my husband’s dream of him giving me orange juice in a dream. Seeing the husband giving his wife a cup of orange juice in a dream can indicate Good skin with her short pregnancy, thank God. If a woman sees her husband giving her orange juice, this may indicate happy things that will happen in her life during that period, thanks to God. It is possible that seeing her husband and orange juice in a dream indicates that they will travel soon during this period And God knows best. In the case of seeing the husband being given orange juice by his wife in a dream, this may indicate happy events that will happen to them during that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband giving me milk in a dream. In the case of seeing the husband giving milk to his wife, the dream It may indicate many good things that come to them at that time thanks to God. Seeing a husband giving milk to his wife in a dream may indicate the abundant food he may receive during this period. If a woman sees her husband giving her milk in a dream, it may mean This is because she will become pregnant soon or she will give birth to twins, thank God. Seeing a husband giving milk to his wife in a dream may indicate the map and the huge livelihood that she will bring at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of dreams about my husband giving me his cell phone in a dream. In the event that you see the husband giving his wife A phone in a dream, as this may indicate the end of the financial problems they suffered from in the previous period. Seeing the husband giving his wife a phone in a dream may indicate the stability of the family and the marital happiness they gain during this time, and God knows best. Taking the phone from the husband in a dream may indicate On a large sum of money and a large expense that he may obtain during this time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about a snake in a bed

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a snake in a bed in a dream. Some people search for interpretations of seeing snakes, so we learn in the following lines about the interpretation of a dream about a snake in a bed in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in a bed in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a snake in a bed in a dream can indicate psychological disorders And God knows best. If the dreamer sees a snake in the bed in a dream, this may be a sign of fear, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees a snake in the bed in a dream, this may be a sign that someone is trying to harm her, and God knows the unseen. If the girl sees a snake In bed, this may indicate psychological disorders for the girl, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a snake without poison in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a snake without poison in a dream. We did not find specific explanations for seeing it. However, seeing a snake in a dream could be a sign of hostility, and God knows best. Just as seeing a snake in the house It could represent a problem, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the snake without being afraid of it, it may indicate the dreamer’s courage, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of the dream of a snake entering the house in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of a snake entering the house in a dream. The snake that enters the house in front of the dreamer can express problems as He can express the problems he faces, and God knows everything that he does not see. When a single girl sees a snake entering her house in a dream, this could be a sign of trouble and difficulties, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees a snake entering the house, it may cause problems for the woman, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a snake in the kitchen In a dream, the interpretation of a dream about a snake in the kitchen in a dream could express financial problems, and God knows best. When a married woman sees snakes in the kitchen in a dream, this may be evidence of the financial problems of the woman’s husband, and God knows the unseen. If a married man sees a snake in the kitchen in a dream, this may indicate... Need and poverty, and God knows the unseen. The snake in the kitchen can also indicate poverty and lack of money, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of a snake coming out of a wall in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a snake coming out of a wall in a dream may lead to bad words, and God knows the unseen. So a snake coming out of a wall in a dream could It indicates turmoil, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a snake emerging from the wall of the house may indicate turmoil among the people of the house, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer sees the snake emerging from the wall of his house, this may indicate disturbances on the part of the people of the house, which may lead to the occurrence of Rupture.Interpretation of a dream of a pink snake in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a pink snake in a dream, it could be a sign of a disabled woman, and God knows all that is not seen. When a single girl sees a pink snake without fear, it can harm, and God knows best. When a single girl sees a pink snake in a dream, it can be a sign of harm, and God knows best. He knows the unseen. Seeing a pink snake can also indicate harm, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a plastic snake in a dream. title: Interpretation of a dream about figs in a dream

preview.html: Figs are one of the fruits that many people see in their dreams. They do not know of any indication that this dream could be. Many scholars have explained this dream and vision in a clear way, so that everyone can be reassured about this matter, and we will get to know all the interpretations of seeing figs in a dream a lot. If you are interested in knowing it, follow us.Seeing figs in a dreamSeeing figs in a dream can be one of the good things that everyone hopes for, as it is one of the beautiful, good and delicious fruits, but it also varies from one form to another or from one person to another. But in general, it is one of the visions that indicate goodness and plenty of food in addition to health and well-being, and today we will learn about all the signs that this vision appears in a dream. Interpretation of seeing figs in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin spoke about seeing figs in a dream as one of the beautiful and worthy visions. Praiseworthy and intense. It also indicates goodness, livelihood and money at all times, and it can mean seeing a person eating figs brings good news. He also said: Seeing a person eating figs in a dream means that he will soon receive good news and he must be prepared for that. Also, a large number of figs in a dream symbolizes To the presence of an abundance of sustenance with money, as well as children, with their moral and religious goodness. There is also someone who sees that he eats a lot of figs until he is satisfied, and this is evidence that he earns money and does not tire of it. If the figs appear, but are not in good condition, this indicates To the depression that the dreamer will experience when he receives the unpleasant news. Some can be seen eating fermented figs, which also indicates good eyesight, kindness and a lot of nourishment for the insightful. Seeing him eating dried figs at this time is also good at the end of the illness if the dreamer is suffering Of something. Seeing figs in a dream for a single woman: An unmarried girl may see figs in her dream and not understand its meaning or may worry about it, but we must assure her that this is very beneficial for her and we will learn more as follows: Seeing a girl eating figs in a dream means that her husband He will soon become a very good person. If a girl eats figs and sees their wonderful taste and beauty, this indicates that she will obtain a wish that she has achieved a lot or a position in her work. If she eats dried figs, this indicates her engagement to a man who has beauty and personality. Seeing figs in a dream is for a married woman if A married woman saw figs in a dream, this indicates many things, but they are very good. Seeing a married woman eating figs in her dream means that the bad things in her life are over. But if her husband feeds her figs, this indicates that she will become pregnant soon. And if he eats dried figs, this A sign of good news. Seeing figs in a dream for a man. There are also different meanings when a person eats figs, and many very good things appear, and we can learn about them as follows: Eating figs for a man is evidence that he will earn a lot of money through his trade and work in the future. Nearby. But when he eats...

title: Interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream or dreams through the website Vision roy2a.com. Seeing an injured hand in a dream has many meanings. Seeing it can be a sign of good or an omen of evil. Interpreters differed in the interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream, depending on the individual’s condition. The dreamer, his circumstances, and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream? A dream by Ibn Sirin: Seeing an injured hand in a dream refers to the dreamer who acquires lawful money without effort, such as inheritance. Seeing a wound on the right hand without blood in a dream indicates that the dreamer hears unacceptable words about his family. Seeing the dreamer injured in his thumb in a dream says that he is falling into debt. Many things that he will not be able to pay. Seeing a dreamer being hit with a knife in a dream indicates doing many bad things that are not pleasing to God. Seeing the dreamer binding his wound in a dream indicates a broad diet and promising things for him. See also: Interpretation of seeing deformed hands in a dream. What is the interpretation? Seeing an injured hand in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq: Seeing a girl with an injury in her hand in a dream indicates the date of her approaching marriage to a good and special person who will make her happy and appreciate it. Seeing a married woman with an injury in her hand in a dream announces that he will enjoy a lot of money and livelihood in the near future. Seeing a divorced woman with an injury In her hand in a dream, she announces that she will find the right man for her and marry him. Seeing a man with an injured finger in a dream indicates his life full of happiness and love with his wife and the stability of his married life. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Eid sacrifices in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman A married woman injures her hand and there is blood on it in a dream. It shows that he is living a volatile love story that will soon end in failure. Seeing an unmarried woman whose hand was injured in a dream without blood indicates her excessive spending and spending a lot of money without interest. Seeing an unmarried woman healing her hand from wounds in a dream indicates the end All the problems and crises in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman with an injured hand in a dream indicates that she is spending her husband’s money on unnecessary things, making him a major cause of problems between them. Seeing a married woman injured in a dream indicates many Problems between her and her husband and the instability of her marital life. Seeing a married woman healing her wound in a dream indicates getting rid of crises and problems in her marital life. See also: Interpretation of seeing fingers in a dream Interpretation of seeing a wound in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman injured in a dream indicates the nearest date It will be a birthday for her and it will pass easily. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with many wounds on her body indicates the interference of those close to her in her life, which causes her distress.

Seeing a married woman with an injury in her hand in a dream announces that he will enjoy a lot of money and livelihood in the near future. Seeing a divorced woman with an injury In her hand in a dream, she announces that she will find the right man for her and marry him. Seeing a man with an injured finger in a dream indicates his life full of happiness and love with his wife and the stability of his married life. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Eid sacrifices in a dream What is the interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman A married woman injures her hand and there is blood on it in a dream. It shows that he is living a volatile love story that will soon end in failure. Seeing an unmarried woman whose hand was injured in a dream without blood indicates her excessive spending and spending a lot of money without interest. Seeing an unmarried woman healing her hand from wounds in a dream indicates the end All the problems and crises in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing an injured hand in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman with an injured hand in a dream indicates that she is spending her husband’s money on unnecessary things, making him a major cause of problems between them. Seeing a married woman injured in a dream indicates many Problems between her and her husband and the instability of her marital life. Seeing a married woman healing her wound in a dream indicates getting rid of crises and problems in her marital life. See also: Interpretation of seeing fingers in a dream Interpretation of seeing a wound in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman injured in a dream indicates the nearest date It will be a birthday for her and it will pass easily. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream with many wounds on her body indicates the interference of those close to her in her life, which causes her distress.
